title: Strictly Come Dancing Finalists Decided Through Tense Dance-Off
summary: The three finalists for Strictly Come Dancing have been confirmed following a dramatic dance-off during Sunday's results show. Balvinder Sopal, an EastEnders actor, and Amber Davies, a reality TV star, found themselves in the bottom two for the elimination round. After performing their routines again, the judges voted to eliminate Sopal, marking her sixth time in the dance-off this series. Davies, who survived for the second consecutive week, will advance to the final alongside social media influencer George Clarke and former footballer Karen Carney. Sopal expressed deep gratitude for her journey, highlighting the challenges and joys of competing, and praised her partner Julian Caillon for unwavering support. On Saturday, each celebrity performed two dances, with Carney and her partner achieving the top score of 78 out of 80. The episode also featured a surprise tribute to departing hosts Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman, adding an emotional layer to the competition's climax.

background_read: Strictly Come Dancing is a British television dance competition that pairs celebrities with professional dancers. Each week, couples perform ballroom or Latin dances, judged by a panel of experts who provide scores. Public voting combines with judges' scores to determine the bottom two, who then face a dance-off where judges decide the elimination. The show emphasizes entertainment, personal growth, and dramatic moments, often highlighting emotional journeys of contestants. It has been a cultural staple since 2004, known for its glittering costumes and high-energy performances.
